```{r library, include=FALSE}
my_packages <- c("tidyverse", "data.table")
pacman::p_load(char = my_packages)

tmp <- list()
```

# Load data

# Select mini test/development data 
```{r}
load(file = "Input/01/mRNA.Rda")
load(file = "Input/01/cnv.Rda")
load(file = "Input/01/meth.Rda")
load(file = "Input/01/protein.Rda")
```

Extract these three omics:
```{r}
vars <- ls()[!ls() %in% c("my_packages", "tmp", "vars", "i", "config_list")]
for(i in vars){
  tmp$a <- base::get(i)
  assign(i, tmp$a[1:100,])
}
```

# Save
```{r}
save(
  ccle_mRNA,
  gdsc_mRNA,
  NCI60_mRNA,
  tavor_mRNA,
  UMPDO1_mRNA,
  UMPDO2_mRNA,
  UMPDO3_mRNA,
  Xeva_mRNA,
  file = "Input/04/mRNA.Rda"
)

# cnv
save(
  ccle_cnv,
  gdsc_cnv,
  gCSI_cnv,
  Xeva_cnv,
  file = "Input/04/cnv.Rda"
)

# protein
save(
  ccle_proteinms,
  ccle_proteinrppa,
  file = "Input/04/protein.Rda"
)

# meth
save(
  ccle_meth,
  file = "Input/04/meth.Rda"
)
```
